name: Hero Siege (itch) (Gordox)
description:
Hi, 

After having developing this game for a while I came to a place that I need to get some feedback. That is why I decided to make an open game test.

I would be happy if you try it out and send in feedback to my google form linked in the project and here: https://forms.gle/vSfVNezS1VDqWKq79

Thanks again from Anton(Gordox), solo developer of Hero Siege
